text: The Kansas City Spurs were a soccer club which played in United States from 1968 until 1970. ==League position== Season League Position 1968 NASL Semifinal 1969 NASL Champions 1970 NASL 2nd / North ==References== Category:1968 establishments in the United States Category:1970 disestablishments in the United States Category:Sports in Kansas City, Missouri Category:1960s establishments in Missouri Category:20th-century disestablishments in Missouri Category:Defunct American soccer teams
title: Kansas City Spurs
